ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Whistling Warsong stacking with Anthem
ygData.msgSnippet: The greater Haste effect is always supposed to override.  Way back in beta the haste from Warsong & Anthem stacked though :( I assume you mean Hymn not Lullaby
ygData.messageBody:
The greater Haste effect is always supposed to override. Way back in beta
the haste from Warsong & Anthem stacked though :(

I assume you mean Hymn not Lullaby :) The numbers shown are the actual
amount Hymn increase regen, add to that your natural regen + other regen
spell effects to get the actuall HPs regained per round.

Natural Regen rates (non-troll):
Standing (all levels) 1/rnd
Sitting (1st-19th lvl) 2/rnd
Sitting (20th+ lvl) 3/rnd



-----Original Message-----
From: jhenders@... [mailto:jhenders@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 08, 2000 2:37 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Whistling Warsong stacking with Anthem


From: jhenders@...


Rokenn's song analysis says these songs will partially stack but not the
speed component. Does the lower speed of Anthem override Warsong on the
bard or does the bard still get the 20% boost?

Also, I happened to notice that the table for lullaby doesn't mention
the difference in healing between sitting and standing. Isn't it more
than just +2 hp for sitting?
